name: Hologram Shark 3D Simulator
description:
This app is intended for entertainment purposes only and does not provide true Hologram.
Hologram Shark 3D Simulator - is a simulation game where you can play on your phone like a 3D hologram of a shark. Fond of dangerous predatory fish? Then you just love it! Play with a whale or white shark! The game uses a camera for a more realistic effect!
Make fun and play your friends and loved ones!
Thank you for playing our games and apps! Leave us feedback and we try to make our games better!
